thread.title: Wonderful location.
thread.title_full: Wonderful location. - Review of Rydges Kensington London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: SusieqRoadtripper
title: Wonderful location.
text:
Rydges is perfectly located for visiting V&A Museum, Kensington Palace, Hyde Park and Harrod's, all within easywalking distance. Nick at Reception was an amazing host suggesting Da Mario as a great place for dinner and making us feel so welcome. He also was able to arrange and book our driver out to Heathrow for us.
The room was well appointed however the bathroom was small despite the great shower.
